item.title: BlackRock, Citadel Back Upstart Texas Challenge to NYSE, Nasdaq
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- BlackRock Inc., Citadel Securities and other investors are backing an upstart Texas stock market to challenge to the New York Stock Exchange and Nasdaq Inc. The Texas Stock Exchange has raised $120 million and plans to file registration documents with the US Securities and Exchange C...

item.title: BlackRock, Citadel Plan New Texas Stock Exchange, WSJ Reports
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- A group backed by investors including BlackRock Inc. and Citadel Securities is planning an upstart stock market in Texas in a challenge to the New York Stock Exchange and Nasdaq Inc., the Wall Street Journal reported. The Texas Stock Exchange plans to file registration documents with...

item.title: UBS, HSBC Urge China to Expand Wealth Links With Hong Kong
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- Hong Kong’s central bank chief and executives at UBS Group AG and HSBC Holdings Plc called for the expansion of wealth links between the city and mainland China, months after a key initiative was bolstered. The Hong Kong Monetary Authority is in talks with the industry about potentia...

item.title: S erhöht Ausblick für UBS Group auf "stabil"
item.author: handelszeitung.ch
item.description: SDA Die Restrisiken aus der Integration und der Restrukturierung der Credit Suisse hätten sich insgesamt verringert, hiess es am Dienstag weiter. Und die Zahlen für das erste Quartal 2024 zeigten, dass sich das Geschäft der UBS stabilisiere und sich die Rentabilität verbessert habe. Die Ratings von ...

item.title: WorldFirst choisit BNP Paribas et Numeral pour gérer ses flux de paiements en zone Sepa
item.author: L'AGEFI Quotidien (éd. de 7 heures)
item.description:
Grâce
à leur alliance, la banque et la fintech françaises offrent aux prestataires de paiement un accès plus simple et plus rapide aux infrastructures européennes.
Racheté en 2019 par Ant Group, WorldFirst est un important prestataire de services de paiement (PSP) créé à Londres il y a 20 ans. L'e...
